name: Day 8: Drag to Delete
description:
Welcome to day 8 of 15 in the Figma prototype challenge! Today, we're going to use what we learned about Interactive Components (Day 3), Autolayout (Day 6), and On Drag (Day 7) to create a Drag to Delete list!  In the file you will find:

  1. A gif demonstrating the animation
  2. A workspace for you to build your prototype
  3. The built out prototype to use as reference
  4. Community examples for inpsiration


Feel free to follow the prompt or create a new, unique prototype. Whatever you choose to do, don't forget to post a Remix or publish a new Community File with the tag FigmaPrototypeChallenge! Happy prototyping! ðŸŽ‰
